blitzEdit.application

Class CircuitCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • blitzEdit.application.ResizableCanvas
          • blitzEdit.application.CircuitCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Styleable, EventTarget

    public class CircuitCanvas
extends ResizableCanvas
    Canvas used for displaying the circuit with its components and connectors.
    Author:
    Chrisian GÃ¤rtner, David Schick

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircuitCanvas

        public CircuitCanvas(ScrollPane scrollPane)
        Sets the mouse event handler and adds a new Circuit.
        Parameters:
        scrollPane - Reference to the scroll panel the canvas is located

    • Method Detail

      • onMousePresseHandler

        private void onMousePresseHandler()
        Adds the event handler for the mouse pressed event. Primary button click used selecting elements and connecting Connector, secondary button used for right click menu and middle mouse button used for moving the viewport in the scroll panel.

      • onMouseDraggedHandler

        private void onMouseDraggedHandler()
        Adds the event handler for the mouse drag event. Primary button click used for moving one or multiple elements, middle mouse button used for moving the viewport in the scroll panel.

      • translateElement

        private boolean translateElement(Element e,
                                 double dx,
                                 double dy)
        Used for moving an element by an offset. Checks that coordinates aren't below zero to prevent the element from disappearing.
        Parameters:
        e - Element to move.
        dx - X-axis offset the element gets moved
        dy - Y-axis offset the element gets moved
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully moved the element, false if the position would be out of boundaries

      • translateElements

        private boolean translateElements(java.util.Collection<Element> elements,
                                  double x,
                                  double y)
        Used for moving multiple elements by an offset. Uses the translateElement method.
        Parameters:
        elements - Collection of element to move.
        x - X-axis offset the element gets moved
        y - Y-axis offset the element gets moved
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully moved the element, false if the position would be out of boundaries

      • moveElement

        private boolean moveElement(Element e,
                            double x,
                            double y)
        Used for moving an element to a given position.
        Parameters:
        e - Element to move.
        x - X position the element get moved to
        y - Y position the element get moved to
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully moved the element, false if the position would be out of boundaries

      • snapToGrid

        private int[] snapToGrid(double x,
                         double y)
        Used for aligning a point to the grid.
        Parameters:
        x - X position needs to be aligned to the grid
        y - Y position needs to be aligned to the grid
        Returns:
        int[] Contains the aligned grid position

      • DragAndDropElements

        private void DragAndDropElements()
        Adds the event handler for the drag and drop between library canvas and circuit canvas. Adds a component when mouse enters circuit canvas, the reference for component is saved as dragAndDropElement in BlitzEdit controller class. Moving the mouse in the canvas moves the new component.

      • onMouseReleasedHandler

        private void onMouseReleasedHandler()
        Adds the event handler for mouse release. Used for deselecting one or multiple components and connectors.

      • onScrollEventHandler

        private void onScrollEventHandler()
        Adds the event handler for mouse release. Used for deselecting one or multiple components and connectors.

      • onMouseMovedHandler

        private void onMouseMovedHandler()
        Adds the event handler when mouse is moving in the canvas. Used for saving the current mouse position in the canvas.

      • gridOnOff

        public void gridOnOff()

      • drawGrid

        public void drawGrid()
        Draws a grid of lines on the graphical context of this canvas. Use the constants in the GraphicDesignContainer to change the design of the grid. Called everytime the refreshCanvas() is executed.

      • refreshCanvas

        public void refreshCanvas()
        Used for redrawing the content of the canvas when changes to elements of the circuit occured.

      • drawAllCircuitElements

        private void drawAllCircuitElements()
        Draws all elements in the circuit of this canvas according to selection mode. Called everytime the refreshCanvas() is executed.

      • highlightConnectors

        private void highlightConnectors()
        Highlights the connectors in this circuit when the user wants to connect two. Needs a selected connector to prevent highlighting conenctor with the same owner or already connected connectors.

      • connectConnector

        private boolean connectConnector(double x,
                                 double y)
        Checks if a connector is located at x,y and if yes, connects it with the current selected connector. Used when a connector is selected and the mouse button is pressed in the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - X position to check after a connector
        y - Y position to check after a connector
        Returns:
        boolean true if connection worked, false of no connector found at this location or coudn't connect

      • disconnectConnector

        private boolean disconnectConnector(double x,
                                    double y)
        Checks if a connector is located at x,y and if yes, disconnects it with the current selected connector. Used when a connector is selected and the mouse button is pressed in the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x - X position to check after a connector
        y - Y position to check after a connector
        Returns:
        boolean true if disconnect worked, false of no connector found at this location or disconnect didn't work

      • copySelected

        public Element[] copySelected()
        Copies the current selected elements of this canvas.
        Returns:
        Element[] Array containing the selected elements

      • pasteSelected

        public void pasteSelected(Element[] elem,
                          Point2D mousePos)
        Deselect all elements in this canvas and clones all elements in the elem array at the respective position around the mousePos.
        Parameters:
        elem - Elements to paste
        mousePos - Position in canvas to paste the elements

      • deleteSelected

        public void deleteSelected()
        Deletes the current selected elements.

      • selectAll

        public void selectAll()
        Selects all components in this circuit.

      • deselectAll

        public void deselectAll()
        Deselects all components in this circuit.

      • rotateSelectedElements

        public void rotateSelectedElements(double rotation)
        Rotates the selected components in the canvas.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Angle of rotation

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Zooms into the canvas and reduces the scale of the canvas. Scale is limited to a max of 1.

      • zoomOut

        public void zoomOut()
        Zooms out of the canvas and increases the scale of the canvas. Scale is limited to a min of 0,5.

      • zoom

        private void zoom(double step)
        Used for zooming in and out of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        step - Scale factor that gets added (can be negative)

      • getMousePosition

        public Point2D getMousePosition()
        Returns the current mouse position in this canvas or the last position before it left the node.
        Returns:
        Point2D Current mouse position

      • changeCursorStyle

        private void changeCursorStyle(Cursor value)
        Used to change the cursor style in the application.
        Parameters:
        value - New cursor style

      • initiateRightClickMenu

        private void initiateRightClickMenu()
        Used for creating the right click menu with all its menu entries.

      • drawSelectRect

        private void drawSelectRect(double currX,
                            double currY)
        Draws an rectangle with clickX and clickY as origin.
        Parameters:
        currX - X position in canvas, width of rect
        currY - Y position in canvas, height of rect

      • deselectCurrentSelectedElements

        private void deselectCurrentSelectedElements()
        Sets selection mode of selected elements to unselected.

      • selectElement

        private void selectElement(double x,
                           double y)
        Checks if there's a component at x,y position and if yes set it's selection mode to selected. Deselects all other elements first.
        Parameters:
        x - X position in the canvas
        y - Y position in the canvas

      • selectAdditionalElement

        private void selectAdditionalElement(double x,
                                     double y)
        Checks if there's a component at x,y position and if yes set it's selection mode to selected. Deselects elemenent if already added. Sets hasSelectedMultipleElements to true or false if afterwards multiple or only one element is selected.
        Parameters:
        x - X position in the canvas
        y - Y position in the canvas

      • selectElement

        private void selectElement(Element element)
        Sets the selection mode of the element to selected.
        Parameters:
        element - Element to select

      • selectElements

        private void selectElements(double x,
                            double y,
                            double sizeX,
                            double sizeY)
        Sets the selection mode of all the elements in the rectangle to selected.
        Parameters:
        x - X position in the canvas
        y - Y position in the canvas
        sizeX - Width of the rectangle
        sizeY - Height of the rectangle

      • selectElements

        private void selectElements(Element[] elements)
        Sets the selection mode of all the elements in the elements array to selected.
        Parameters:
        elements - Elements that get selected

      • resize

        public void resize(double width,
                   double height)
        Overrides:
        resize in class ResizableCanvas

        public double minHeight(double width)
        Overrides:
        minHeight in class ResizableCanvas

        public double maxHeight(double width)
        Overrides:
        maxHeight in class ResizableCanvas
